table.name: MOP_CL_INTERFACE
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_INTERFACE (interfaceCode TEXT NOT NULL primary key,protocol TEXT NOT NULL,parameterTmp TEXT,timeOut integer);

table.name: MOP_CL_VERSION_ITEM
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_VERSION_ITEM(itemId TEXT NOT NULL primary key,itemCode TEXT NOT NULL,itemName TEXT NOT NULL, isSystem TEXT,isPrivate TEXT NOT NULL, className TEXT NOT NULL);

table.name: MOP_CL_CALLBACK
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_CALLBACK (recordId TEXT NOT NULL primary key,targetId TEXT NOT NULL,targetType TEXT NOT NULL,className TEXT NOT NULL);

table.name: MOP_CL_VERSION
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_VERSION (recordId TEXT NOT NULL primary key,itemId TEXT NOT NULL,version integer NOT NULL, updateTime TEXT,userId TEXT NOT NULL);

table.name: MOP_CL_USER
MOP_CL_PARAMETER
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_PARAMETER (parameter TEXT NOT NULL primary key,ownerId TEXT NOT NULL,value TEXT NOT NULL);

table.name: MOP_CL_PERSONALIZED
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_PERSONALIZED (personalizedId TEXT NOT NULL primary key,userId TEXT NOT NULL,configCode TEXT NOT NULL, configValue TEXT NOT NULL);

table.name: MOP_CL_MENU
MOP_CL_ATTACHMENT
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_ATTACHMENT (attachId TEXT NOT NULL primary key,attachName TEXT NOT NULL, businessDataId TEXT NOT NULL,uploadTime TEXT,businessType TEXT,localPath TEXT);

table.name: MOP_CL_DIC_ITEM
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_DIC_ITEM (itemId TEXT NOT NULL primary key, dictionaryCode TEXT NOT NULL, itemCode TEXT NOT NULL, itemValue TEXT NOT NULL, parentId TEXT,sortOrder integer, internalCode TEXT, isLeaf TEXT);

table.name: MOP_CL_OUTSYSTEM
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_OUTSYSTEM (systemCode TEXT NOT NULL primary key, systemName TEXT NOT NULL, parameter TEXT,uri TEXT NOT NULL,downloadUrl TEXT);

table.name: MOP_CL_NETTRAFFIC
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_NETTRAFFIC (recordId TEXT NOT NULL primary key, recordDate TEXT NOT NULL, totle INTEGER, type TEXT);

table.name: MOP_CL_TREE
table.sql: create table MOP_CL_TREE (treeId TEXT NOT NULL primary key, sql TEXT NOT NULL, paramter TEXT, idFile TEXT NOT NULL, nameFile TEXT NOT NULL,parentIdFile TEXT NOT NULL,typeFile TEXT,isLeafFile TEXT,image TEXT,fileList TEXT);

insert into MOP_CL_TREE (treeId, sql, paramter, idFile,nameFile,typeFile,parentIdFile,isLeafFile,image,fileList) values('dictionaryTree','select itemId,itemCode,itemValue,isLeaf,parentId from MOP_CL_DIC_ITEM where dictionaryCode=?','dictionaryCode','itemId','itemValue','isLeaf','parentId','isLeaf','','itemCode');
